verses.name: Psalms 33:1
verses.text: Rejoice in the Lord, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.

verses.name: Psalms 33:2
verses.text: Praise the Lord with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.

verses.name: Psalms 33:3
verses.text: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.

verses.name: Psalms 33:4
verses.text: For the word of the Lord is right; and all his works are done in truth.

verses.name: Psalms 33:5
verses.text: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 33:6
verses.text: By the word of the Lord were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
